transport.access_summary: Reachable via the Hope Valley line; a short walk or taxi ride to the trail start.

ai.summary: A classic Peak District ridge walk with spectacular views across Edale and the Hope Valley, linking Mam Tor with the Great Ridge.
ai.terrain_summary: Firm ridge paths with some steep sections and stone steps. Exposed in windy conditions.
ai.safety_notes: High winds can be severe along the ridge. Stay back from steep drops and check the forecast.
ai.best_seasons: Spring through autumn, or clear winter days.

seo.title: Mam Tor & The Great Ridge Walk â€“ Peak District Hiking Route
seo.meta_description: A classic 8 km Peak District ridge hike over Mam Tor with panoramic views across Edale and Hope Valley.
